name: Berries
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - 1 serving daily
Helps with knee osteoarthritis pain and inflammation
benefits: Higher intake of anthocyanins (berries' brightly colored pigments) is associated with anti-inflammatory effects, a key component in reduced chronic disease risk. Simply adding berries to one's diet can have a significant impact on pain, inflammation, and overall quality of life, including improvements in knee osteoarthritis. High antioxidant content supports heart health and weight management with low calorie density.
amount: 1 serving daily (1/2 cup fresh or frozen berries, or 1/4 cup dried)
